txt.en: The Altar of Despair can be found in the Circle of Despair in Minas Morgul.\n\nYou should enter the Altar of Despair.
The map table can be found at Echad Uial.\n\nYou should set the etching down on the map table.
The Altar of Despair can be found in the Circle of Despair in Minas Morgul.\n\nYou should destroy the Orb of Despair.
You show Tordoron the etching.\n\n'I am not sure what to make of this etching. Perhaps I will be able to study it soon. Set it down on our map table for now so I will remember it later.'
Thoroughly search all seven locations ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
The map table can be found at Echad Uial.\n\nYou should examine the etching and map.
The Altar of Despair can be found in the Circle of Despair in Minas Morgul.\n\nYou should examine the barrier protecting the artifact.
Set the etching down on the map table
Destroy the Orb of Despair
The Altar of Despair can be found in the Circle of Despair in Minas Morgul.\n\nYou should make an etching of the plaque.
The seven locations on the map can be found throughout Mordor.\n\nYou should thoroughly search all seven.
Tordoron can be found at Echad Uial.\n\nYou should talk to Tordoron.
TBD
Examine the barrier protecting the artifact
For those reclaiming Minas Ithil from the grasp of darkness, a trial of despair has begun.
Make an etching of the plaque
TBD
Thurindol can be found at Echad Uial.\n\nYou should talk to Thurindol.
You hope that the Rangers will be able to assist you in deciphering this plaque
The Altar of Despair can be found in the Circle of Despair in Minas Morgul.\n\nYou should return to the the Altar of Despair.

'Our best scholars have learned more from the pages you obtained, [placeholder]. They now understand that each artifact assists in maintaining the protective layer of sorcery that envelops the city. If we destroy all the artifacts, the aura of sorcery around Minas Morgul will begin to decay.\n\n'What is more, we now know the location of the fourth artifact. It rests in a chamber upon the Circle of Despair. Quickly now, we must make for the chamber and destroy the artifact!'
Talk to Tordoron
You set the etching upon a map of Mordor and something odd catches your eye
The Altar of Despair can be found in the Circle of Despair in Minas Morgul.\n\nYou should examine the plaque next to the altar.
Return to the Altar of Despair
Talk to Tordoron
The artifact rests upon its pedestal but is protected by a strange barrier
There does not seem to be any way to destroy the barrier
The positioning of the gems upon the plaque is odd
It looks as if the points on the etching match up with structures in Mordor!

'I thank you for undergoing the difficult task of destroying the fourth artifact. You have done well in your efforts. I hope soon we shall learn more about where the next artifact lies. Until then, we shall continue our efforts in reclaiming Imlad Morgul for Gondor.'
Destroyed strange rune ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Tordoron can be found at Echad Uial.\n\nYou should talk to Tordoron.
Vale of Sorcery: The Trial of Despair
The guardian falls, and the artifact shatters
Enter the Altar of Despair

'You say the gems on that plaque you encountered might be a map? That sounds a worth while investigation! I would recommend searching the location that is closest to us first, just in case your theory is proven false. You are still needed here after all!'
Talk to Thurindol
TBD
The barrier has been dispelled!
Examine the plaque
A strange haze clouds your vision
Examine the etching and map
